blog.name: hourglasscinnarose
blog.title: Apples Have Feelings
blog.description: There's a lot of stuff that do. Theories, headcannons, theme songs, drawings, tips, you name it, you could probably find it here. Well....If you name one of those things that I've already listed, then you'd probably find it here. Anyway! I think I speak for all apples when I say that they have feelings. Idk how long I'm able to make this.

title: Harry Potter Houses with Socks
body:
Gryffindor: You know those socks with the words on it and they’re really sassy for some reason? Yeah, those. They usually have a black background with colorful words. They get the sassy socks. They’re probably not super long, but they could but up to the shin. Maybe right under the knee.

Ravenclaw: Patterns. Patterns everywhere. Probably have knee high socks, maybe a bit longer. They’re not afraid to miss-match.

Hufflepuff: Either their socks are ultra fluffy or they’re single colored and about ankle high. The fluffy socks can be anywhere from ankle to above the knee. 

Slytherin: Fandom based almost always. The length is usually right below the knee. If they can’t get ahold of the fandom socks, they’re probably wearing the random pair they found in a bag and no one was sure who they belonged to before, but it’s there’s now.

Minerva: I am and will always be prepared for anything.
Minerva: unless of course with “prepared” you mean completely...
body:

Minerva: which in that case I can tell I am rarely prepared.

blog.name: badgerburdenedwithfeels
blog.title: Stupid Muggles won't get this badger down
blog.description: This is where all things hp end up. Expect lots of Hufflepuff pride, Darry, Marauders stuff, Luna Lovegood, WolfStar aaand the list goes on.

summary: Everybody talks about how Hufflepuff is the most "inclusive" house and that might or might not be the reason everyone thinks...
body:
Everybody talks about how Hufflepuff is the most “inclusive” house and that might or might not be the reason everyone thinks Hufflepuff consists of a “load o’ duffers”.

Well I’m sorry. But hufflepuffs could be just as brave as any Gryffindor, they could be just as smart as any ravenclaw, they could be just as ambitious as any slytherin. What sets Hufflepuffs apart is the fact they put hard work, fair play, loyalty and other morals before a specific character aptitude.

And now, hands up if you appreciate the fact that people can and are willing to achieve their goals, but what matters is if they stay loyal to their loved ones while achieving their goals in a fair way. Hands up if you think natural intelligence is nice, but at the same time if you gain your wit and knowledge through hard work and perseverance, that truly deserves a round of applause. Hands up if you think it’s great to be brave and daring, but true bravery is standing up for your friends and family, and being loyal to them no matter what.

Congratulations my friend. You’re a Hufflepuff, where are we are just and loyal. We patient hufflepuffs are true and unafraid of toil.

blog.name: etspeaksfromhome
blog.title: ET Speaks From Home
blog.description: Write about ET (Eileen Teo and not Extra-Terrestrial) as a mother of two, my two beautiful kids and products/service that I review or use! Both of my children are child models, working with Alan Sharman Agency (Birmingham) and Source Models Agency (London). I will blog on my experiences with them too.

summary: Harry Potter and Wizarding World Collection
title: Harry Potter and Wizarding World Collection
body:
Harry Potter and Wizarding World Collection from @Pyramid_Int #review

Our family have been huge fans of the Harry Potter movie series which are, of course, based on the bestselling series of novels by J.K. Rowling since it was first shown back in 2001. It is one of those magical movie experiences that continues to captivate us across eight films with a cast including Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint, Alan Rickman and Ralph Fiennes.

(more…)

summary: Harry Potter if I had written it:
body:
Harry Potter if I had written it:

Mr. and Mrs. Dursley, of number four, Privet Drive, were proud to say that they were perfectly normal, thank you very much. And their nephew Harry was proud to say he was a wizard, and hopelessly in love with Draco Malfoy. That’s it. All was well.

title: A breakdown of this gifset
body:
Mr. Weasley: Harry’s decided to sell drugs to our sons

Luna: Harry’s decided to murder someone

Dumbledore: Harry just finished murdering someone

Dobby: Harry’s in time out now.

Neville: No, Harry. I won’t break up with you.

Hagrid: Harry decided to flash everyone in the great hall

Hermione: Harry’s ditching his homework in favor of leading a hang

Ron: Harry’s shoplifting for alcohol

Minerva: Harry is dancing with Professor Snape under a disco ball

Mrs. Weasley: Harry’s stealing a car from the used car dealership they’re shopping at

Remus: Harry has revealed his undying love for Professor Snape

Professor Snape: Mister Potter just because you are in love with me does not mean I’ll let you pass your potions final

Ginny: Harry has devoured Professor Snape in front of the whole school for not letting him pass his potions final

Sirius: Harry, that was rad. No, you don’t have to go to bed.

Harry: totally has done all those things and more

blog.name: rachelundefined
blog.title: RachelUndefined
blog.description:
Who am I? Can anyone really answer that question? I don't know who I am. I'm undefined.

What am I into? My biggest, but by no means only, passion is HP fanfics. My interests are many and varied, and my posts reflect my diversity.

Will our interests correspond? Only you can answer that question. Or will you, like myself, remain undefined?

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Lily Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

summary: The Wizarding World is a dangerous place! The magical community in the United Kingdom has been fighting a threat from the...
caption:
The Wizarding World is a dangerous place!

The magical community in the United Kingdom has been fighting a threat from the shadows as the Dark Lord Voldemort grows ever more powerful. His followers, the Death Eaters, wreak havoc at his behest, striking fear into even the bravest of hearts. But there are those who refuse to give into the darkness. Albus Dumbledore, Headmaster of Hogwarts, leads the Order of the Phoenix, a secret society of courageous witches and wizards determined to battle back against Voldemort’s forces.

The First Wizarding War was never cut and dry, though. Each side comprised of more than simple heroes and villains. They were people, who lived and loved and fought and died. Each had a life and each had a story. What side will you pick and whose story will you tell?

For the intrepid and curious we offer:

  • Highly literate, and para-centric role-play
  • Dark and complicated themes (these plots are not for the faint of heart)
  • A steady paced, active, and fun-filled environment
  • A safe place to brainstorm or bounce ideas

Our Most Wanted Characters include:

  • James Potter
  • Lily Potter
  • Bellatrix Lestrange
  • Amycus Carrow

And Many MORE!

Home || Rules || Apply || Navigation || FAQs

Author, HTTYD lover, YoI Enthusiast, and creative soul.

I also take writing commissions. Just message me for details.

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Lily Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

tags: i'm not dead yet and it's a shame
summary:
a thing I made for tomarry spring exchange!! yet again, it was fun to participate

it's was the Spring Exchange, I thought it...
caption:
a thing I made for tomarry spring exchange!! yet again, it was fun to participate

it’s was the Spring Exchange, I thought it would be nice to add some flowery symbols! Harry is blooming with the dog rose, which symbolises the faith. And calendula, which stands for sorrow and cruelty, is blooming out of Tom.
